token: INSERT TOKEN HERE (Should be a string)
help:
<spec:prefix> is the current prefix, and <spec:charsign> is the current charsign.
roll/r: Rolls dice and does python math.
		Usage: dice: <spec:prefix>r(oll) [dice expression] <extra string, added to end if it exists>
		Usage: python: <spec:prefix>r(oll) \`[python expression]\` \`<additional python expression>\` \`<additional python expression>\` ... 
		Special: if a math expression contains strings of the form '<spec:charsign>character:attr<spec:charsign>', it will be replaced by that character's attribute, if it exists.
newchar: Adds a new character, with optional starting attributes.
		Usage: <spec:prefix>newchar "[name]" <list of attributes, of the form 'key=attr', separated by spaces; double quotation marks surrounding key and attr allow spaces in those fields>
viewchar: Shows the names of the attributes of a given character; OR, if the optional attribute key is provided, shows the value of said attribute, if it exists.
		Usage: <spec:prefix>viewchar "[name]" <attribute key>
editattr: Edits the attributes of an existing character
		Usage: <spec:prefix>editattr "[name]" <list of attributes, as for newchar; additionally '!key' deletes the 'key' attribute from the characer>
hidechar: Toggles whether a character is visible or invisible to the 'general population', i.e. not the character's creator or an admin.
		Usage: <spec:prefix>hidechar "[name]"
delchar: Deletes a character; only usable by the character's creator or an admin.
		Usage: <spec:prefix>delchar "[name]"
poke: Pings the bot
		Usage: <spec:prefix>poke
poll: Starts a basic in-discord poll under the message
		Usage: <spec:prefix>poll <anything may be written here, for the sake of human legibility>
ref: Looks up various info from the book
		Usage: <spec:prefix>ref <Category> [fuzzy lookup keyword(s)]
ref categories: Gives a list of possible 
		Usage: <spec:prefix>ref categories
top: Gives the top results for a given ref search. If a user requests more results than the current default, it will be PMed to them, rather than put in a public channel. Current default number of results is <spec:top_amount>. 
		Usage: <spec:prefix>top <# of results> <Category> [fuzzy lookup keyword(s)]
prefix: Changes the prefix; only available to admins!
		Usage: <spec:prefix>prefix [new prefix]
charsign: Changes the charsign; only available to admins!
		Usage: <spec:prefix>charsign [new charsign]
top_amount: Changes the default number of results for top; only available to admins!
		Usage: <spec:prefix>top_amount [new top_amount]
